SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameComponents

Class GameTable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameComponents.GameTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameTableInterface
public class GameTable extends Object implements GameTableInterface
Class that represents the game table of a single game, it stores all the important information like goals, decks and codex

      goalsDeck - deck of Goal
      cardDeck - deck of Card
      goldCardDeck - deck of GoldCard
      cardToPick - deck of Card that the player can take
      goldCardToPick - deck of GoldCard that the player can take
